Opcode.Name: BRIDGE_SVL
Opcode.Description: No Lookups!!!!Note!!!! this is a not a real AppDB this is KBP-Command (Master Key) it is appear as AppDB in the device PP for the sake of completeness when transferring information to the SDK !!!!

Opcode.Name: IPV4_MULTICAST_PRIVATE_W_UC_RPF
Opcode.Description: 4 lookups: (1)Forward: (a){VRF,G,S,In_LIF} (b){VRF,G,In_LIF,S} (2)RPF (a){VRF,SIP} (b){SIP}!!!!Note!!!! this is a not a real AppDB this is KBP-Command (Master Key) it is appear as AppDB in the device PP for the sake of completeness when transferring information to the SDK !!!!

Opcode.Name: IPV4_UNICAST_PRIVATE_W_UC_RPF
Opcode.Description: 4 lookups (1) Private and Public, (2) FWD and RFP, resulting in 2 results: FWD and RPF!!!!Note!!!! this is a not a real AppDB this is KBP-Command (Master Key) it is appear as AppDB in the device PP for the sake of completeness when transferring information to the SDK !!!!

Opcode.Name: IPV6_MULTICAST_PRIVATE_W_UC_RPF
Opcode.Description: 4 lookups: (1)Forward: (a){VRF,G,S,In_LIF} (b){VRF,G,In_LIF,S} (2)RPF (a){VRF,SIP} (b){SIP}!!!!Note!!!! this is a not a real AppDB this is KBP-Command (Master Key) it is appear as AppDB in the device PP for the sake of completeness when transferring information to the SDK !!!!

Opcode.Name: IPV6_UNICAST_PRIVATE_W_UC_RPF
Opcode.Description: 4 lookups (1) Private and Public, (2) FWD and RFP, resulting in 2 results: FWD and RPF!!!!Note!!!! this is a not a real AppDB this is KBP-Command (Master Key) it is appear as AppDB in the device PP for the sake of completeness when transferring information to the SDK !!!!

Opcode.Name: MPLS_PER_PLATFORM
Opcode.Description: 1 lookups (1) in KBP_MPLS_PER_PLATFORM!!!!Note!!!! this is a not a real AppDB this is KBP-Command (Master Key) it is appear as AppDB in the device PP for the sake of completeness when transferring information to the SDK !!!!

Opcode.Name: NOP
Opcode.Description: NOP!!!!Note!!!! this is a not a real AppDB this is KBP-Command (Master Key) it is appear as AppDB in the device PP for the sake of completeness when transferring information to the SDK !!!!
